title: Midnight
lyrics:
In the darkness
Before the dawn
In the swelling
Of this storm
Running round and with apologies
And hope is gone

Leave a light, a light on



Millions are

Lost from home

In the swelling

Swelling on

Running round and with a thunder

To bleed from thorns

Leave a light, a light on

Leave a light, a light on



Leave a light, a light on

Leave a light, a light on



In the darkness

Before the dawn

In the darkness

Before the dawn

Leave a light, a light on

Leave a light, a light on
